title: dilli vandu
sahitya:
dilli vandu kunril Eri tangi ninradum en murugA illai vEru kunrengum illai enru karudittAnO


anupallavi

  tillai vAsak-kailAsanai tEDik-kUDum AshaiyODu shigaiyil iddilli vAsa selvar Ashaikk-isaindAyO


caraNam 1    tiruvEragam uraiyum guruparA un tiruvuLattE dillit-talai nagar irukkum ellAt-tamizh anbarukkum
tara vENum darishanam enap-perum karuNai pirandadO tiruppugazhai avar pADum varisaikkuriya parishenavE
    caraNam 2    marumaikkum immaikkum arumaiyAna phalan tarum tiruppugazh tanaip-perum tiraLAghak-kUDip-pADi varum
perumaikkuriya tamizharin arugirundu aruL puriya virumbi ingu vITranaiyO tirumbi engum tiriyAmal
